Class AuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.AuthenticationService
public class AuthenticationService extends Object
Handles user authentication and session management.
Author:
M9

      fbs - the flight booking system
      testMode - if true, data won't be persisted to files

      password - the password
      Returns:
      true if login successful
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if authentication fails
